comment.body:
> [ancap](#comment_1_1FYXQGLBeNabf5jZHgP4CwzbmJSKaK4oMz): Is it possible to add drag-and-drop for images and do you know if ZeroBlog (either your enhanced version or the default project version) plans to implement that?It's extremely convenient to be able to create posts from the Web browser, but images (also other attachments, but images in particular as they're usually added inline) still need to be uploaded using another method.

you may want to try 
http://127.0.0.1:43110/typeblog.bit/?Post:8:ZeroBlog+扩展:+更方便的文件上传
